item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge Service Datatype Description This service manages purges associated with a CDN mapping Configuration. Methods createPurge This method creates a purge record in the purge table, and also initiates the create purge call. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge record. getPurgeHistoryPerMapping This method returns the purge history for a given domain and CDN account. getPurgeStatus This method gets the status of a given purge path.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge Service Datatype Description This data type models a purge event that occurs in caching server. It contains a reference to a mapping configuration, the path to execute the purge on, the status of the purge, and flag that enables saving the purge information for future use. Local

item.title: saveOrUnsavePurgePath
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge::saveOrUnsavePurgePath Creates a new saved purge if a purge path is saved. Deletes a saved purge record if the path is unsaved. Overview Parameters Name Type Description uniqueId string path string saveOrUnsave integer Required Headers authenticate Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Network_CdnMarketplace_Configuration_Cache_Purge[] Error Handling SoftLayer_Exception <<< EOT
